item.title: Blob Urban Art Coffee Mug
item.description: We love street art from Hamburg . Again and again, the most beautiful works of art are painted overnight by unknown artists, which are beautiful to look at, before they are then washed off again. Fortunately, with this Blob Urban Art Coffee Mug we can continue to enjoy both. The art and the coffee!

item.title: Smiling Skulls Coffee Mug
item.description: Bring a little sass to your chic with this Smiling Skulls Coffee Mug . And like the Mexican Dia de Muertos, the smiling skull reminds us that life is short and should be enjoyed daily with lots of music, good food and delicious coffee. ☕????☕????

item.title: Retro Waves Classic Coffee Mug

While technology may have limited the color palettes of the games, their colors were no less influential than the pop culture as a whole. With this Retro Waves Classic Coffee Mug , we simply want to tie in with this popular and hip era. Do you prefer a different color? Then take a look at the Bonbon and Alpine styles as well.

item.title: Che Guevara Urban Art Coffee Mug
item.description: We love street art from Lagos , Portugal. Unfortunately, more and more old houses and factories are being torn down or renovated and the street art motifs on them disappear with it. Fortunately, with this Che Guevara Urban Art Coffee Mug , we can continue to enjoy both. The art and the coffee!

item.title: All Women To The Front No1 Urban Art Coffee Mug
item.description: Urban art may not be the first thing that comes to mind when thinking of Bangkok . If you look closely, you will find a lot of interesting street art like graffiti, paste ups, stickers and murals hiding in the many small sois and alleys. With this All Women To The Front No1 Urban Art Coffee Mug you can underline your expression and make a personal statement in your environment. You like the design and want to know what the corresponding model looks like? Then take a look at the No2 version.
